THE iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls: Gravure For You! Vol. 1

name: The Idolmaster: Cinderella Girls - Gravure for You! Vol. 1
summary:
This volume adds the ability to take pictures of two idols at a time, and to add music from CD's into the BGM list.
Idol Focus: Uzuki Shimamura
Costumes: Anime Opening Costume, Schoolgirl Wear, 346 School Swimsuit
Locations: Castle with Clock Tower, Big Tree, School Pool
